org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.script

Class EvalScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
      • groovy.lang.Script
        • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.script.EvalScript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    groovy.lang.GroovyObject

    public class EvalScript
extends groovy.lang.Script
implements groovy.lang.GroovyObject

    Base class for evaluator configuration scripts. It contains the metaclass machinery to set up evaluation taskMap.

    Since:
    0.10

        Throws:

        public List<String> glob(String globPattern)

        Performs a file search based upon the parameter glob pattern.

        Parameters:
        globPattern - String in glob syntax giving the glob to expand.
        Returns:
        A list of paths from the working directory to matching file names.

      • glob

        public List<String> glob(String globPattern,
                String baseDir)

        Performs a file search based upon the parameter glob pattern.

        Parameters:
        globPattern - String in glob syntax giving the glob to expand.
        baseDir - The base directory from which to search.
        Returns:
        A list of paths from the base directory matching the glob.
